name: Battle
content: 你曾认为我们都会好的
Now your askin me to listen
现在你要我倾听你的心声
Well then tell me bout everything
没有谎言我们在释放时间
And its your final last call
这是你最后一次打给我
You made a mistake  we know
You used to be happy  try
曾经是那么快乐，所以努力吧
You've got them on your side
And they won't change their minds
I just hope its worth the fight
And its your final last call
最终这是你最后一次打给我
You made a mistake  we know
你难道看不出你伤我很深吗
And its your final last call
You made a mistake  we know
你难道看不出你伤我很深吗
这是你最后的一通电话
And its your final last call
这是你最后的一通电话
